trade_signal_metadata.name: Adaptive KAMA Trend Follower with Volatility Filter
trade_signal_metadata.desc: This innovative trading algorithm utilizes the Kaufman Adaptive Moving Average (KAMA) to capture trends while adjusting sensitivity based on market conditions. By incorporating the Parkinson Volatility indicator for regime filtering, it strategically identifies high-probability trading opportunities in daily OHLC price data. Designed for optimal backtesting, this algorithm effectively combines trend-following principles with robust volatility analysis.
